display_long_description:
# JOIN THE ULTIMATE PICKLEBALL COMMUNITY
Stay sharp with Pickleball One: connect with the community, compete in exciting tournaments, earn XP, and unlock new levels as you improve your game while staying fit. 
[media]

# PLAY SINGLES OR DOUBLES

Challenge friends to singles or doubles matches and enjoy a variety of game modes, social features, and customizable match settings including physics, and scoring options.
[media]
# MAINTAIN YOUR GAME SKILLS AND FITNESS YEAR-ROUND

Perfect for players looking to maintain their edge during the off-season, Pickleball One offers targeted practice for all aspects of the game, from strategic plays to physical fitness.

[media]

# COMMON QUESTIONS

**Do I Need a Lot of Space to Play?**

Not at all! Pickleball One is designed to adapt to spaces of all sizes. With adjustable movement settings, you can enjoy the game comfortably in a small area while still getting a full and immersive experience.

**What is Pickleball One’s Mixed Reality Mode?**

Mixed Reality Mode seamlessly blends your physical space with the virtual court, giving you the freedom to move naturally while safely enhancing your practice sessions and workouts. Dive into an immersive training experience that feels like stepping onto the court!

**How can I get support or connect with others?**

Join the Pickleball One Discord or email support@playingames.net for assistance.

# COMMON QUESTIONS

**Do I Need a Lot of Space to Play?**

Not at all! Pickleball One is designed to adapt to spaces of all sizes. With adjustable movement settings, you can enjoy the game comfortably in a small area while still getting a full and immersive experience.

**What is Pickleball One’s Mixed Reality Mode?**

Mixed Reality Mode seamlessly blends your physical space with the virtual court, giving you the freedom to move naturally while safely enhancing your practice sessions and workouts. Dive into an immersive training experience that feels like stepping onto the court!

**How can I get support or connect with others?**

Join the Pickleball One Discord or email support@playingames.net for assistance.
